bzh.plealog.bioinfo.ui.carto.data

Class FeatureOrganizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • bzh.plealog.bioinfo.ui.carto.data.FeatureOrganizer

  • public class FeatureOrganizer
extends Object
    This class is used to organize features on category lanes.
    Author:
    Patrick G. Durand

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FeatureOrganizer(List<FeatureCategoryMatcher> matchers)
      Creates a feature organizer given a list of feature category matchers.

      Creates a feature organizer given a list of feature category matchers.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<FeatureForACategory> organize(FeatureTable fTable, double xFactor)
      Call this method to organize the features on various category lanes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FeatureOrganizer

        public FeatureOrganizer(List<FeatureCategoryMatcher> matchers)
        Creates a feature organizer given a list of feature category matchers.
        Parameters:
        matchers - the list of feature category matchers.

      • FeatureOrganizer

        public FeatureOrganizer(List<FeatureCategoryMatcher> matchers,
                boolean forceOneLanePerCategory)
        Creates a feature organizer given a list of feature category matchers.
        Parameters:
        matchers - the list of feature category matchers.
        forceOneLanePerCategory - if true then all features will be added to a unique lane. Otherwise, as soon as a lane contains spanning features, they will be added to separate lanes.

    • Method Detail

      • organize

        public List<FeatureForACategory> organize(FeatureTable fTable,
                                 double xFactor)
        Call this method to organize the features on various category lanes.
        Parameters:
        fTable - the features to organize.
        xFactor - the sequence to pixel conversion factor.
